TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 为 控件指定查看模式。

span.span: Names viewing modes for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图提供了查看模式页的一个示例。The following figure provides an example of Page viewing mode. 页模式下一次显示一个页面中的内容。Page mode displays a single page of content at a time. 请注意，此模式下包括页面导航控件的显示当前页计数和位置，并提供的**下一步**和**上一步**页上的按钮。Note that this mode includes page navigation controls that display the current page count and position and provide **Next** and **Previous** page buttons. 此查看模式下不显示滚动条。This viewing mode does not display scroll bars. ![FlowDocReader ViewMode Page](~/add/media/flowdocrdrviewmode-page.png "FlowDocReader ViewMode Page")![FlowDocReader ViewMode of Page](~/add/media/flowdocrdrviewmode-page.png "FlowDocReader ViewMode of Page") 下图举例说明 TwoPage 查看模式。The following figure provides an example of TwoPage viewing mode. TwoPage 模式非常到页模式相似，但两个面向页将显示一次，类似于打开的书。TwoPage mode is similar to Page mode, except two facing pages are displayed at a time, similar to an open book. 请注意，此模式下包括页面导航控件的显示当前页计数和位置，并提供的**下一步**和**上一步**页上按钮; 在此模式下，**下一步**和**上一步**页按钮导致内容一次，类似于书中打开一个页面跳转由两个页。Note that this mode includes page navigation controls that display the current page count and position and provide **Next** and **Previous** page buttons; in this mode, the **Next** and **Previous** page buttons cause content to jump by two pages at a time, similar to turning a page in a book. 当前页码指示前导页。The current page number indicates the leading page. 此查看模式下不显示滚动条。This viewing mode does not display scroll bars. ![FlowDocumentReader ViewMode Book](~/add/media/flowdocrdrviewmode-book.png "FlowDocumentReader ViewMode Book")![FlowDocumentReader ViewMode of Book](~/add/media/flowdocrdrviewmode-book.png "FlowDocumentReader ViewMode of Book") 下图提供一种滚动查看模式。The following figure provides an example of Scroll viewing mode. 此查看模式下不包括页面导航控件;相反，用户导航内容使用提供滚动条。This viewing mode does not include page navigation controls; rather, the user navigates content using provided scroll bars. 为了页计数和导航，滚动查看模式显示了其数量始终为 1 的一页。For the purposes of page count and navigation, Scroll viewing mode presents a single page whose number is always 1. ![屏幕快照： FlowDocumentReader ViewMode Scroll](~/add/media/flowdocrdrviewmode-scroll.png "屏幕快照： FlowDocumentReader ViewMode Scroll")![Screenshot: FlowDocumentReader ViewMode of Scroll](~/add/media/flowdocrdrviewmode-scroll.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentReader ViewMode of Scroll")
